betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §3Crafting Station§r is a highly §9advanced Crafting Table§r with inventory slots for item and tools. You can input recipes by either dropping ghost items onto the GUI, or by using the §a+§r in §2JEI§r. Crafting the items will use the items and tools in the inventory. The 9 slots on the right are saved up recipes so you can re-use them without re-opening §2JEI§r.

Similar to the Tinker's Crafting Station, what makes the GregTech §3Crafting Station§r amazing is the fact that §6it can use adjacent inventories§r in addition to its own inventory.

§bLore:§r The reason Nomifactory had Forestry in its modlist was almost entirely due to the Worktable, which serves a similar function to the Crafting Station. A couple more Forestry items were used - but otherwise. the whole mod's functionality was disabled! That isn't the case in this pack.
